Package net.glowstone.inventory.crafting

Class CraftingManager

java.lang.Object
net.glowstone.inventory.crafting.CraftingManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe>
public final class CraftingManager extends Object implements Iterable<org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe>
Manager for crafting and smelting recipes.

  • Method Details

    • getLayers

      public static int getLayers​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack... items)
      Get the amount of layers in the crafting matrix. This assumes all Minecraft recipes have an item stack of 1 for all items in the recipe.
      Parameters:
      items - The items in the crafting matrix.
      Returns:
      The number of stacks for a recipe.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Loads all recipes.

    • addRecipe

      public boolean addRecipe​(org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe recipe)
      Adds a recipe to the crafting manager.
      Parameters:
      recipe - The recipe to add.
      Returns:
      Whether adding the recipe was successful.

    • removeRecipe

      public boolean removeRecipe​(org.bukkit.NamespacedKey key)
      Removes a recipe from the crafting manager.
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the recipe to remove.
      Returns:
      Whether a recipe was found and removed.

    • getFurnaceRecipe

      public org.bukkit.inventory.FurnaceRecipe getFurnaceRecipe​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack input)
      Get a furnace recipe from the crafting manager.
      Parameters:
      input - The furnace input.
      Returns:
      The FurnaceRecipe, or null if none is found.

    • getFuelTime

      public int getFuelTime​(org.bukkit.Material material)
      Get how long a given fuel material will burn for.
      Parameters:
      material - The fuel material.
      Returns:
      The time in ticks, or 0 if that material does not burn.

    • isFuel

      public boolean isFuel​(org.bukkit.Material material)

    • removeItems

      public void removeItems​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] items, GlowCraftingInventory inv)
      Remove a layer of items from the crafting matrix and recipe result.
      Parameters:
      items - The items to remove the ingredients from.
      inv - The inventory to remove the items from.

    • removeItems

      public void removeItems​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] items, GlowCraftingInventory inv, int amount)
      Remove a specific amount of layers from the crafting matrix and recipe result.
      Parameters:
      items - The items to remove the ingredients from.
      inv - The inventory to remove the items from.
      amount - The amount of items you want to remove.

    • getCraftingRecipe

      public org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe getCraftingRecipe​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack... items)
      Get a crafting recipe from the crafting manager.
      Parameters:
      items - An array of items with null being empty slots. Length should be a perfect square.
      Returns:
      The Recipe that matches the input, or null if none match.

    • iterator

      public Iterator<org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe> iterator()
      Specified by:
      iterator in interface Iterable<org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe>

    • getRecipesFor

      public List<org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe> getRecipesFor​(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack result)
      Get a list of all recipes for a given item. The stack size is ignored in comparisons. If the durability is -1, it will match any data value.
      Parameters:
      result - The item whose recipes you want
      Returns:
      The list of recipes

    • getRecipeByKey

      public org.bukkit.inventory.Recipe getRecipeByKey​(org.bukkit.NamespacedKey key)
      Look up a recipe.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to look up
      Returns:
      the recipe with the given key, or null if none match

    • clearRecipes

      public void clearRecipes()
      Clear all recipes.

    • resetRecipes

      public void resetRecipes()
      Reset the crafting recipe lists to their default states.
